jobDescription: Position : Sr. Data Analyst Job Duties :  Master’s degree + 2 Years of Exp., Perform accuracy & timelines audits & analysis of Claims, Inquiry, Membership & Group enrollments in accordance with MTM system; Recommend corrective actions, System, Procedural modification & enhancements; Manage accuracy audits & design of Host claims which include NASCO & Inter-Plan teleprocessing Systems (ITS); Compile, analyze & report fraudulent information; Create data mappings & data sets for NASCO & FACETS implementation; Generate timeliness reports; Run the jobs on DB2 database to generate samples for member, group, claim, inquiry, MOS, CFD, BX & Call/Corr, EVIR & HCBO using Shell & JCL Scripts; Generate routine & adhoc Claims waiting for response, presentations of project results from the Business Objects 6.5 & Crystal reports; Data warehousing, development; Analyze reports of data duplicates. Skills: XML,, Business Intelligence, MS Word, Excel,  Access : Candidate must be willing to be assigned anywhere in the US. HCL Global Systems Inc., 24543 Indoplex Circle, Suite # 220, Farmington Hills, MI 48335.
